headline.main: BARDIA IS CAPTURED BY SOUTH AFRICANS; Bombing of Record Intensity Precedes Assault, Balking Axis Hope for a 'Tobruk' AXIS STRONGHOLD IN EASTERN LIBYA FALLS BARDIA CAPTURED BY SOUTH AFRICANS

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Jan. 2 -- Throttling any hope the Germans and Italians might have cherished of creating an Axis version of Tobruk at Bardia, South African troops, supported by British tanks, artillery and planes, this morning smashed the last Nazi strong point in the perimeter and captured the town.
abstract: U S ships and planes reptd aiding N I defense

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
